text: Santa Apolonia and Santa Apolónia are the Spanish and Portuguese spellings of Saint Apollonia. It is also used as a place name: *Santa Apolonia, Chimaltenango, Guatemala *Santa Apolonia, Matanzas, Cuba *, Peru *Santa Apolónia Station, a major railway and metro station in Lisbon, Portugal *Santa Apolonia, Trujillo, Venezuela
title: Santa Apolonia
